details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.4.3 Digital signatures - Signer of PKCS#7 object
details.description: The PDF Signature (a DER-encoded PKCS#7 binary data object) shall be placed into the Contents entry of the signature dictionary. The PKCS#7 object shall conform to the PKCS#7 specification in RFC 2315. At minimum, there shall only be a single signer (e.g. a single "SignerInfo" structure) in the PDF Signature.
